name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Alexander J. GUREVICH.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Alexander J. GUREVICH.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Alexander J. GUREVICH.
No. D-3007.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 27, 2017.
Alexander J. Gurevich, of Greenwich, Connecticut, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
